DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial effect 3-month treatment combination 200 mg ofloxacin twice daily 150 mg roxithromycin twice daily clinical course recent-onset reactive arthritis . Patients followed-up regular interval 6 month . The main outcome measure recovery arthritis , secondary outcome measure include swollen tender joint count , Ritchie index , joint pain , serum C-reactive protein level blood erythrocyte sedimentation rate . The study also address safety tolerability long-term antibiotic treatment . 56 patient enrolled enrollment patient complete .
